alert.note: Alert for Allen; Avoyelles; Evangeline; Rapides (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 17 at 2:52AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Rapides, northern Evangeline, southwestern Avoyelles and northeastern Allen Parishes through 330 AM CDT... At 252 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lecompte to near Oakdale. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bunkie, Glenmora, Cheneyville, Turkey Creek, Cottonport, Lecompte, Beaver, Forest Hill and Mcnary. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 50 and 68. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CDT for central and southwestern Louisiana.
